forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Rain may be heavy late. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Rain may be heavy late. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, some heavy early. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, some heavy early. Low around 40F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
